page.title: 07The School Today
page.content: The{school building}has been modernised with new inside toilets and oil-fired central heating.{Mr {Allison,}the Headteacher,teaches Prim. 5,6 and 7.{Mrs Soutar}teaches Prim.1,2,3 and 4. School starts at 9 am and finishes at 3.30pm. At age 11+ pupils move on to {Newtyle Secondary {School}for two years and then go on to {Harris Academy}in{Dundee.}The wall, which has been knocked down, divided the playground into two,one for the boys and one for the girls. School meals are delivered daily from{Dundee. Some pupils bring a packed lunch. Apart from normal subjects,{Maths, {English, Environmental Studies}etc.we have specialists in{Music, PE, Art}and {Crafts.}In addition we go weekly by bus to{Dundee}for indoor games and swimming.
